The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 September is 312,276 (554.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 September, there were 16,516 new confirmed cases (29.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 August, there were 8,148 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 103% (8368 extra cases).
